name: Banners
help: This component is dedicated to promote certain features about your store, for example promotions, features products, categories among others using images and links.

columns_desktop.name: Number of columns on desktop
columns_desktop.help: Choose how many banners will be displayed by row on desktop version.

image_size.name: Images size
image_size.help: Original: The image will be displayed with the dimension it was originally uploaded. Resize: adjust the width and height of the image according to the available space. Force: crop the width and height of the image according to the available space.

image_ratio.name: Image aspect ratio
image_ratio.help: Choose 3 image aspects: Horizontal, Vertical and Square
